.assgen-notification {
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  color: white;
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  font-weight: bold;
  -webkit-box-pack: center;
      -ms-flex-pack: center;
          justify-content: center;
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0; }
  .assgen-notification .assgen-notification__close {
    color: white;
    font-size: 3rem;
    position: absolute;
    top: 80px;
    right: 40px; }
    .assgen-notification .assgen-notification__close:hover {
      cursor: pointer; }
  .assgen-notification .assgen-notification__inner-modal {
    max-width: 70%; }
  .assgen-notification .assgen-notification__title {
    font-size: 4rem; }
  .assgen-notification .assgen-notification__content {
    font-size: 2rem; }
  .assgen-notification .assgen-notification__out {
    color: #ccab00;
    font-size: 2rem; }
